page.title: 15Tommy Bennett-Age 11. Barton
page.content: A typical Monday for me is to get up at about 8 o'clock,get dressed and go down stairs for breakfast which is usually Frosties,marmalade on toast and a cup of tea.I then clean my teeth with my red toothbrush and kiss my mum and the cat,Nippa,goodbye.I set off for school on my BMX TURBO bike.At school I play Bulldog with my friends before to the classroom.At dinnertime most children bring sandwiches or have a school meal but as my family are vegetarians I prefer to go home. After dinner my year,the 4th year Juniors,are split up into three groups for craft lessons of pottery,weaving and needlework.I am making a felt pencil case in needlework After school I go home for tea which is sometimes egg and chips.I then play with my friends either Snooker or on our bikes.Before going to bed at 8 pm I watch "The Young Ones" on Television.
